markdownRemark.html:
Ingredients

Whole Foods

Cooking Instructions

  1. Combine ground meat with onion, garlic, spices, and salt and form 4 patties.
  2. Pan fry patties in 1 tablespoon oil over medium high heat for 7 minutes on each side.
  3. To make a taco pocket, blister a flour tortilla on a hot griddle pan for 30 seconds on each side.
  4. Place tortilla on dinner plate and spread surface with 1/4 cup mild taco sauce.
  5. Pile shredded lettuce, tomatoes and a handful of cheese in center of tortilla. Top veggies and cheese with cooked taco burger patty and wrap tortilla up and over patty on all four sides.
  6. Turn square pouch over and cut from corner to corner, making 2 taco pockets that will not crumble and drip like traditional tacos.
  7. Serve taco pockets with cut fresh seasonal veggies, assorted tortilla chips and mild salsa for dipping.

frontmatter.title: Pretzel Dumplings
frontmatter.description: This post is related to the gatsbyjs
frontmatter.recipeIntroParagraph: These were great as a Super Bowl apetizer. They were really easy to make and using spicy mustard took them to the next level. Next time I should wrap the dough tighter so that the cheese doesn`t melt out the sides in the oven. I think a lot of the cheese was lost during baking.
